mn66:5.20: kaṇṭakāvāṭampi → kaṇṭa­ka­vaṭṭampi (bj, pts1) | kaṇikavāṭampi (si, mr) | kaṇṭakarājimpi (s1-3, km)
mn66:5.28: Bhikkhussa ātumārī, bhikkhussa mātumārī → ṭhitoti. bhikkhussa ātu māri bhikkhussa mātu māri (s1-3, pts1) | ṭhito’ti. bhikkhussa ātumātumārī (mr)
mn66:5.29: na tveva varaṃ yaṃ → na tveva yā (bj, pts1) | na tveva yaṃ (s1-3), carasī’ti → carasāti (si, pts1)
